transform.query: SELECT UnSubscribedData."Account Name" as "Account Name", UnSubscribedData."Contact Name" as "Contact Name", UnSubscribedData."Contact Email" as "Email Address", UnSubscribedData.Category as "Category" , UnSubscribedData.Reason as "Reason", SmartListExpectedData."Contact.Id" as "Contact ID", SmartListExpectedData."Contact.AccountId" as "Account ID" From UnSubscribedData LEFT OUTER JOIN SmartListExpectedData ON UnSubscribedData."Contact Email" = SmartListExpectedData."Contact.Email"
